<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 1"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Elven Verve](/Feats.aspx?ID=976) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Elf" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=58" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Character Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=12) pg. 26 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

</column>

---

While all elves are immune to the paralyzing touch of [ghouls](/MonsterFamilies.aspx?ID=52), you can shake off flesh-numbing magic of all kinds. You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to saves against effects that would impose the [immobilized](/Conditions.aspx?ID=24), [paralyzed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=28), or [slowed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=35) conditions. When you would be immobilized, paralyzed, or slowed for at least 2 rounds, reduce that duration by 1 round.
name: Elven Verve
